mapper.select: select user_id, name, age, sex, email_account, email_domain, authorization from user where user_id = #{user_id} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, name, password, age, sex, email_account, email_domain, authorization) values (#{user_id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{email_account}, #{email_domain}, 0)
